Description:

In Western Heroes, the player can choose between four heroic cowboys to try to stop a train loaded with a bomb that can destroy major cities of the American West, and part of a plan devised by Professor Molina, a scientist loco.Entre various modes of play, which includes the famous story mode with twelve levels to complete, also found cooperative mode for a minimum of two players and the competition mode. Beyond the main story Western Heroes also brings various tests to improve the way our aim as resistance or skeet shooting.

For the fans of shooters, BigBen Interactive has released the Western Heroes Pack, which includes a replica of the Winchester rifle adapted for use with the Wiimote and Nunchuck for the Wii.
